response.overview: Denmark's most popular dance band can now celebrate its 25th anniversary. After thousands of live jobs and an impressive record sale of over 1.2 million CDs / LPs, on January 4, 2014, Kandis can celebrate a silver wedding and look back on a great career. The band has become an institution in the Danish entertainment industry, established and respected on the same level as Kim Larsen, Shubidua, Flemming Bamse Jørgensen, Brdr. Olsen et al. More popular than ever before and with Denmark's biggest fan club! The anniversary was celebrated with the recording of a large and beautiful TV show from the Holstebro Music Theater where 1000 audiences experienced a cornucopia of Kandis hits on a strip seasoned with international guest stars: Hansi Hinterseer, Semino Rossi and Swedish Thorleifs.
response.title: Kandis  25th Anniversary Show
